It was to those worn down in His service, not to those who were always sparing themselves, that Christ addressed His gracious words. And today it is to the self-forgetful, those who work to the very extent of their ability, who are distressed because they  cannot do more, and who in their zeal go beyond their strength, that the Saviour says, "Come ye yourselves apart, . . . and rest awhile." 

                                               -
